welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cianjur, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the beauty of our lush green landscapes, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Martabak Bangka
restaurants.description: Martabak Bangka is a asian restaurant located in Cianjur.
restaurants.address: Jl. Suroso No. 1, Cianjur, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Alam Sunda ( sambal dower )
restaurants.description: Alam Sunda ( sambal dower ) is a afghan restaurant located in Cianjur, Westjava Indonesia.
restaurants.address: Cianjur, Westjava Indonesia, Cianjur, Westjava Indonesia

restaurants.name: Fun Fun Milk
restaurants.description: Fun Fun Milk is a café located in Cianjur.
restaurants.address: Jl. Hos Cokroaminoto (Jalan Raya), Cianjur, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Nasi Uduk Mang Lili
restaurants.description: Nasi Uduk Mang Lili is a breakfast spot located in Cianjur.
restaurants.address: Jl. K.H. Hasyim Ashari Warujajar Desa Solokpandan, Cianjur, Jawa Barat 43214

restaurants.name: Maple Bakery
restaurants.description: Maple Bakery is a bakery located in Cianjur.
restaurants.address: Jl. Taifur Yusuf No.16, Cianjur, Jawa Barat 43216

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Husein Sastranegara Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
